vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.20.26
§ Ira = "watchful of a city"
1) the Jairite, one of David's great officers
2) one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Tekoite, son of Ikkesh, and another of David's mighty warriors
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   de Jaír; sacerdote de David; (b)   hijo de Iqués; de Tecoa; guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (c)   de Jatir; guerrero; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "城市的監察者"
1) 一位睚珥人, 曾任大衛王手下的高官 (撒下 20:26)
2) 大衛王的大能勇士之一 (撒下 23:38)
3) 提哥亞人基吉的兒子, 大衛王手下的另一位大能勇士 #撒下 23:26|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "城市的监察者"
1) 一位睚珥人, 曾任大卫王手下的高官 (撒下 20:26)
2) 大卫王的大能勇士之一 (撒下 23:38)
3) 提哥亚人基吉的儿子, 大卫王手下的另一位大能勇士 #撒下 23:26|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.26;
son of: Ikkesh (H6142)
§ Ira = "watchful of a city"
1) the Jairite, one of David's great officers
2) one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Tekoite, son of Ikkesh, and another of David's mighty warriors

A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.38
§ Ira = "watchful of a city"
1) the Jairite, one of David's great officers
2) one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Tekoite, son of Ikkesh, and another of David's mighty warriors
